title: A Crow Left of the Murder

chunks.lyrics: Album- A Crow Left Of The Murder
I didn't think this was the best Incubus album,I thought Morning View was a little bit better.
(Very slow and deep phaser is added the 3rd and 4th time around)
(Slow phaser is again added at the 5th through 8th time around)
(Slow phaser is again added at the 3rd time around untill the end of the song)
